title: Republic Day parade: India showcases military might, growth story ‚Äî top developments
content: President Droupadi Murmu and Prime Minister Narendra Modi presided over the main ceremony at Kartavya Path in the national capital. The President of the European Council, Antonio Costa, and the President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen, also attended the celebrations as chief guests. Kartavya Path, which runs from Rashtrapati Bhavan to the National War Memorial, has been extensively decorated to reflect India‚Äôs journey over the years.

title: India marks 77th republic day: Who are the chief guests?
content: India celebrates its 77th Republic Day with a grand parade on Kartavya Path, showcasing military might and cultural diversity. European Commission president Ursula von der Leyen and European Council president Ant√≥nio Costa are this years chief guests, highlighting a deepening strategic partnership. Discussions on a crucial free trade agreement and a new security pact are underway, underscoring strong India-EU ties.

title: Padma awards 2026 for Dharmendra, Shibu Soren, cricketers Harmanpreet Kaur, Rohit Sharma
content: The Padma Awards 2024 celebrated a remarkable 131 honorees, including icons like Dharmendra and the late V S Achuthanandhan, alongside sports stars Rohit Sharma and Harmanpreet Kaur, and cinematic legend Mammootty. This year's recognition extends to the unsung heroes from various fields and remote areas, with 10 districts making their award debut.

title: Microsoft and Amazon take out full-page ad, warn Washington faces ‚Äòemergency‚Äô
content: Tech giants Microsoft and Amazon, usually fierce rivals, have joined forces to tackle Washington State's severe housing crisis.  The companies jointly penned an op-ed, pledging $1.6 billion to build over 26,000 affordable homes for the community. They urge policymakers to prioritize policies that simplify and expedite construction, warning that inaction risks further economic decline and talent loss.

title: Accenture CEO Julie Sweet to CEOs: In three years, your company should offer different services and insights
content: Accenture CEO Julie Sweet emphasized that leaders must deeply understand AI to guide their companies through necessary changes. She shared a client example where 300 leaders touching keyboards to experience AI was crucial for progress. Sweet stressed that leader-led learning, followed by broader employee training, is essential for unlocking AI's transformative potential across industries.

title: 75+ Happy Republic Day messages, greetings, wishes and quotes for 2026
content: As India gears up for its 77th Republic Day in 2026, the nation celebrates its Constitution, the 'Rule Book' uniting 1.4 billion citizens.

title: 150 Years of 'Vande Mataram' at Republic Day Parade today
content: Republic Day celebrations at Kartavya Path will highlight the 150th anniversary of the national song 'Vande Mataram'. The event will showcase India's developmental progress, military strength, and cultural diversity, with tableaux themed around 'Swatantrata ka Mantra: Vande Mataram' and 'Samriddhi ka Mantra: Aatmanirbhar Bharat'.

title: Leaked audio: Did Navarro, Vance block India trade deal?
content: Senator Ted Cruz was secretly recorded criticizing Vice President JD Vance and mocking President Trump's tariff policy. Cruz warned donors that the tariffs could harm the economy and lead to Trump's impeachment, recounting a heated call with the President. He also accused Vance of being a prot√©g√© of Tucker Carlson, influencing foreign policy appointments.

title: Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan to shareholders: We can‚Äôt fully meet market demand
content: Chip giant Intel admitted disappointment in meeting market demand, reporting a Q4 loss and forecasting further losses due to supply shortages and production ramp-up costs. Revenue dipped, missing expectations, and shares fell sharply.  The company acknowledged internal missteps in anticipating AI data center CPU demand, with supply issues expected to persist before improving later in spring.

title: Bomb threat triggers high alert at Ayodhya Ram Temple
content: A bomb threat targeting the Ram Temple in Ayodhya on Saturday night led to heightened security and the detention of a caller from Gonda district. Preliminary inquiries suggest the individual may be mentally unstable and was intoxicated at the time of the call. Authorities are conducting a comprehensive investigation to ascertain the motive and verify the threat's credibility.

title: ‚ÄòNot going to challenge‚Äô: BCB accepts ICC call as Bangladesh bow out quietly of T20 WC
content: The Bangladesh Cricket Board has accepted the ICC's decision to replace them with Scotland in the T20 World Cup after the government refused to clear the team for travel to India due to security concerns. The BCB stated they cannot participate in the current fixture and will not pursue arbitration.

title: ‚ÄòNo intention‚Äô: Carney rules out free trade pact with China after Trump threatens tariffs
content: Canada's prime minister Mark Carney denies plans for a free trade deal with China. This comes after US President Donald Trump threatened tariffs on Canadian goods. Carney affirmed Canada's commitment to the CUSMA agreement, which restricts such deals with non-market economies without prior notice. Carney said recent engagements with China focused on resolving existing tariff disputes, not broader trade pacts.

title: Sam Altman plans India visit, may join Pichai, Jensen Huang, Hassabis at AI summit
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is reportedly set to visit New Delhi in February for the India AI Impact Summit 2026, an event attracting global tech leaders. While not officially listed, Altman's visit may include exclusive meetings and a potential standalone OpenAI event. The summit aims to foster AI development and investment in India.

title: Warm-up tie to check Washington backup? SA or India ‚ÄòA‚Äô emerge as likely opponents
content: India's T20 World Cup squad is planning a practice match on February 4 due to injury concerns for Washington Sundar and Tilak Varma. Selectors are exploring options like playing South Africa or India 'A' players. Riyan Parag is being prepared as a potential backup, with his fitness to be assessed soon.

title: Mexico shooting: 11 killed in armed attack at soccer field in Guanajuato
content: At least 11 people were killed and 12 injured in a soccer field shooting in Salamanca, Guanajuato, on Sunday. Security forces are searching for the perpetrators. The incident occurred in a state already grappling with high homicide rates due to criminal group conflicts.

title: ‚ÄòYou never know‚Äô: Abhishek Sharma flirts with Yuvraj‚Äôs iconic record after blazing knock
content: Abhishek Sharma smashed the second-fastest T20I half-century by an Indian, reaching his fifty in just 14 balls against New Zealand. The explosive opener remained unbeaten on 68 off 20 deliveries, guiding India to an eight-wicket victory. Sharma attributed his fearless approach to team expectations and instinct.

title: India‚ÄìEU FTA: New Delhi likely to cut car import tariffs from 110% to 40% - report
content: India is set to significantly slash import duties on European cars, potentially to 40% from over 100%, as a free trade agreement with the EU nears conclusion. This move opens India's auto market, benefiting European brands like BMW and Volkswagen, while protecting domestic electric vehicle production initially. The deal aims to boost trade and diversify supply chains.

title: 8 important things to know before investing in land
content: Land, often overlooked in India's real estate discussions, is emerging as a key asset driven by policy and urban planning. Unlike buildings, land's value hinges on location, zoning, and infrastructure, influenced by government decisions that precede visible construction and dictate future urban growth patterns.

title: SA20: What makes Sunrisers a sporting dynasty - 'A well-balanced team'
content: Sunrisers Eastern Cape pulled off a sensational last-over heist to beat Pretoria Capitals by six wickets and win the fourth edition of the SA20. It was their third title, having also finished runners-up last year. From the auction to structure, SEC are, undoubtedly, T20 franchise cricket's sporting dynasty.

title: ‚ÄòEnough orders from Washington‚Äô: Venezuela interim leader amid pressure from US
content: Venezuelan interim president Delcy Rodriguez said her government would take up long-standing disputes with Washington ‚Äúface to face‚Äù through what she termed Bolivarian diplomacy, according to Xinhua news agency. She said Venezuela had never imagined that a South American capital would be subjected to a military attack by a foreign power, referring to the events of January 3, when US forces attacked Caracas and forcibly took away Maduro and his wife.

title: 'Cooperate, turn over all illegal aliens': Trump's targets Walz amid immigration crackdown
content: Donald Trump urged all Democratic governors and mayors to cooperate with his administration on immigration enforcement, blaming Joe Biden for a surge in illegal immigration and rising violence. He specifically called on Minnesota's Governor Walz and Minneapolis Mayor Frey to assist in deporting "criminal illegal aliens" and demanded an end to "sanctuary cities."

title: Ferry carrying 350 passengers sinks off southern Philippines, at least 15 dead
content: A ferry carrying over 350 people sank off the southern Philippines, resulting in at least 15 fatalities. Over 300 individuals were rescued following a distress call from a coast guard officer on board. Investigations are underway to determine the cause of the sinking, which occurred in good weather conditions.

title: Republic Day alert in Manipur: Security forces recover arms cache, neutralise IEDs
content: Ahead of the Republic Day celebrations, security forces in Manipur have intensified intelligence-based combing, cordon and search operations across vulnerable and fringe areas, leading to the recovery of a large cache of arms, ammunition and explosives, and the arrest of individuals linked to extortion and banned outfits.

title: Why I can never forget my trip to Punjab...what I experienced was beyond what I had imagined
content: A Delhi resident's road trip to Punjab revealed a surprisingly diverse experience, starting with the meticulously planned, green city of Chandigarh and its unique Rock Garden. The journey continued to Amritsar, where the overwhelming peace and selfless service of the Golden Temple left a profound impression, showcasing the state's rich culture and spirituality.

title: 'Border 2' box office collections Day 3
content: Sunny Deol's 'Border 2' is a massive box office success, crossing the Rs 100 crore mark within just three days of its release. The patriotic war-drama, directed by Anurag Singh, has shown remarkable growth, especially with a significant jump on Sunday. The film's impressive occupancy rates indicate strong audience engagement, promising further gains during the upcoming holiday period.

title: Ashok Chakra a collective blessing from people of India, says Shubhanshu Shukla
content: Receiving the Ashok Chakra, India's premier peacetime military distinction, Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla perceives this honor as a shared tribute from a grateful nation. Overflowing with gratitude and a renewed determination, he pledged to push the boundaries of India's innovative space endeavors.

title: Taylor Swift‚Äôs Kelce Romance Sparks Fears Her Songwriting Is Slowing
content: Taylor Swift recently admitted she once feared happiness could weaken her songwriting as her romance with Travis Kelce deepened. She worried that joy might replace the emotional tension that fueled her lyrics. However, her latest album proved otherwise, showing she can create vibrant, story-driven music even during one of the happiest chapters of her life.

title: Did Cardi B name her son 'Touchdown'? Viral photo has fans buzzing
content: Rapper Cardi B sparked online  chaos with a playful response to fan speculation about her son's name. A simple photo caption led to widespread guessing. Cardi B then humorously clarified that the child in the picture was Wavey (son with Offset). She also teased fans about another child, referencing a rumored name.

title: Drake Maye steals hearts with pregame gesture for wife Ann Michael
content: Patriots quarterback Drake Maye's heartwarming pre-game kiss with his wife, Ann Michael, before the AFC Championship game has captivated fans. Their long-standing relationship, dating back to middle school, adds a romantic touch to their NFL journey. Ann Michael's own social media popularity further endears the couple to the public, highlighting a sweet blend of sports and personal connection.

title: 'Fishing in muddy waters': Harbhajan slams Pakistan over Bangladesh T20 WC row
content: Harbhajan Singh criticized Pakistan's stance on Bangladesh's T20 World Cup exclusion, calling it an unnecessary attempt to create a '2 vs 1' scenario. He argued that Pakistan's intervention was uncalled for, as Bangladesh and its players are the ones suffering the most. Harbhajan also suggested the BCB let ego guide its decisions, hindering potential resolutions.

title: Budget 2026 income tax expectations: What can FM do for the next phase of tax simplification?
content: Budget 2026: Last year‚Äôs Budget delivered meaningful tax relief through revisions in personal income-tax slabs and enhancement of the Section 87A rebate.

title: China‚Äôs top general accused of leaking nuclear secrets to US
content: China's top general, Zhang Youxia, is reportedly under investigation for serious violations, including allegedly leaking nuclear weapons program details to the US and accepting bribes for promotions. The allegations surfaced during a military briefing, with authorities scrutinizing his abuse of authority and oversight of a procurement agency. This investigation highlights Beijing's stringent anti-corruption stance.

title: Stock market holiday: Are Sensex, Nifty open for trading on January 26?
content: Indian stock and commodity markets were closed on January 26 for Republic Day, marking the second holiday of 2026. Trading will resume on January 27. A total of 16 market holidays are scheduled for 2026, including national and religious observances.

title: Rajasthan cops seize 10,000 kg of ammonium nitrate on Republic Day eve; 1 held
content: In a startling discovery, Nagaur police uncovered an enormous stockpile of nearly 10,000kg of ammonium nitrate along with various explosive materials at a secluded farmhouse. One person has been taken into custody following this significant find in Sarhad Harsaur village.

title: 15km in 10 hours: Snow rush turns into traffic nightmare in Manali
content: Thousands of tourists were stranded in Manali for a second day due to icy roads and a massive traffic surge. Exit routes saw jams exceeding 10km, forcing tourists to walk on ice in sub-zero temperatures. Many spent the night shivering in vehicles, describing the ordeal as nightmarish.

title: Bangladesh: Hindu mechanic burnt to death in his workshop
content: A 23-year-old Hindu mechanic, Chanchal Chandra Bhowmik, was tragically burnt alive in his Narsingdi workshop after it was deliberately set ablaze while he slept. Despite assurances of minority protection, this planned arson, captured on CCTV, saw Chanchal trapped and unable to escape the flames. Police are investigating and forming a team to apprehend the perpetrators.

title: Despite red flags, Karnataka grants Bengaluru land worth Rs 255 crore to 22 Dalit & OBC mutts
content: In a bold move, the Karnataka government has earmarked a staggering 255 crore rupees in Bengaluru land for 22 Dalit and OBC mutts, dismissing departmental warnings regarding the allocation of protected gomala land within the city. Senior ministers brushed aside concerns raised by the finance and law departments about potential legal implications, asserting these were mere procedural hurdles.

title: 'Will consider if ... ': BCB gives Hasina-linked cricketer ultimate selection conditions
content: Bangladesh cricket officials are considering a return for former captain Shakib Al Hasan, less than a year after his international retirement. This comes as the board also grapples with the team's exclusion from the T20 World Cup due to security concerns in India. Shakib, who had faced public anger, expressed openness to reversing his decision.

title: Magistrate cannot be a judge in his own cause: Supreme Court
content: The Supreme Court has ruled that a judge cannot preside over a case involving themselves, quashing proceedings against a railway official. A special railway magistrate had initiated action against the administration for insufficient staff, claiming interference. However, the apex court found the magistrate attempting to judge his own cause, ending the judicial-railway dispute.

title: Body found by cops not that of wife, man acquitted after 8 years
content: A man jailed for eight years for his wife's murder has been acquitted. The court found critical flaws, including doubts about the recovered body's identity and a lack of established motive. The prosecution's case, built on circumstantial evidence, failed to form an unbroken chain pointing solely to the accused, leading to his immediate release.

title: H-1B visa interview slots unavailable across India; new dates pushed to 2027
content: Indian professionals face significant H-1B visa disruptions as new stamping dates are unavailable this year, with interviews deferred to 2027. US consulates in India report no regular slots, and experts see no immediate improvement. Stricter US visa policies, including social media screening and a ban on third-country stamping, are contributing to the severe delays and visa revocations.

title: ‚ÄòBhajan-clubbing‚Äô no less than global concerts, says PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Modi lauded the youth's 'bhajan-clubbing' trend, a modern fusion of devotion and culture resonating with Gen Z, comparing it to global concerts. He also highlighted Malaysia's Tamil schools, the UAE's 'Year of the Family', and urged a national focus on manufacturing excellence, declaring the 'chalta hai' attitude obsolete.

title: ‚ÄòBecause she has an accent‚Ä¶‚Äô: Indian‚Äëorigin doctor says her mother was ‚Äòharassed‚Äô by ICE agents in Texas
content: In a chilling episode, an Indian-American physician recounted her aged mother's harrowing run-in with ICE officers while shopping in a Texas mall. The agents suspiciously interrogated her about her heritage, mistakenly assuming she was a Spanish speaker, only to backtrack when she confirmed her citizenship.

title: Offensive battle leads to a Seahawks win, a berth to Super Bowl LX
content: Seattle defeats Los Angeles in the NFC Championship Game and advances to Super Bowl LX to face the Patriots.

title: Darnold, Seahawks outlast Rams to reach SB
content: Sam Darnold threw for three touchdowns, the Seahawks' "Dark Side" defense came up with a critical fourth-down stop and Seattle advanced to the Super Bowl, beating the Rams in an electrifying NFC Championship Game on Sunday.

title: Stafford mum on future as Rams left reeling in loss
content: Matthew Stafford declined to answer if he'd be back next season after the Rams suffered a heartbreaking loss to the Seahawks in the AFC title game.

title: Vrabel: Pats' turnaround rooted in belief, identity
content: The Patriots completed a remarkable turnaround under coach Mike Vrabel, earning a trip to the Super Bowl after winning just eight games total the past two seasons.

title: Payton rues 4th-down call after stalling in snow
content: Broncos coach Sean Payton said he will find several "regrets'' in Sunday's AFC Championship Game loss to the Patriots, most notably when he passed up points in the second quarter.

title: 'Disgusted' Stewart protests shooting with sign
content: Unrivaled co-founder and two-time WNBA MVP Breanna Stewart held up an "Abolish ICE" sign during player introductions at Unrivaled on Sunday afternoon.

title: Sources: Giants hire Wilson as Harbaugh's DC
content: The Giants are hiring former Titans defensive coordinator Dennard Wilson for the same role on John Harbaugh's staff, sources told ESPN's Dan Graziano and Jordan Raanan on Sunday.

title: New year, same result: Scheffler wins AmEx by 4
content: Scottie Scheffler ran off four birdies in a six-hole stretch Sunday to blow past 18-year-old Blades Brown and the rest of the field, closing with a 6-under 66 for a four-shot victory at The American Express.

title: Sports Broadcasting Hall of Famer Mason dies
content: Geoffrey Mason, whose career spanned five decades across ABC Sports, ESPN, NBC, Fox, the NFL Network and other networks, died Sunday at the age of 85.

title: üèà Reid's NFL draft QB Hot Board: Mendoza top?
content: Who are the best quarterbacks in the 2026 class? We sized up the top 12, starting with Fernando Mendoza and Ty Simpson.

title: An early look at Super Bowl LX: Experts make picks, answer questions and break down Seahawks-Patriots
content: The Seahawks and Patriots will again meet in the Super Bowl! We have early predictions, matchup insight, looming questions and team breakdowns.

title: Is defeating Madison Keys the breakthrough Jessica Pegula needed?
content: Pegula dismantled the defending champ's game and looked like a player ready to win a Grand Slam title.

content: It's time for the biggest sports betting event of the year. Here's your first betting guide to Super Bowl LX.

content: Odds and trends for Super Bowl LX, plus the updated spread, line, total and FPI projection for the big game.

content: Three straight losses sent the Sooners tumbling out of the top 16. They return after beating South Carolina.

content: The good (Nebraska), not-so-good (Kentucky) and interesting (dominant freshmen) of the 2025-26 season so far.

title: Beating Arsenal puts Man United into Premier League title race
content: Man United are 12 points behind league-leading Arsenal, but after beating the Gunners on Sunday, can the Red Devils pull off an unlikely title push?

title: Steelers to hire Mike McCarthy: Six questions on the new coach, plus a grade
content: The Pittsburgh native and former Dallas Cowboys coach will take over a team with questions starting with QB.

content: Which players take the top spots? After an obvious choice at No. 1, the decisions weren't easy. Our experts tried to crack the code.

title: Predictions for rest of MLB offseason: Where will the best ace available sign? Who will make a major trade?
content: How will the rest of free agency play out? Here's what our experts think could go down between now and spring training.

title: The new Mets are better than the old Mets -- and we can prove it
content: New York will have a new look for 2026. We break down what has changed and whether the team has improved.

title: 'You should've never been born': How Buss family infighting drove the $10B sale of the Lakers
content: The post-Jerry Buss era was defined by resentment, dysfunction and conflict -- and ended with the loss of the most valuable family-owned franchise in the world.

title: Title paths for Gaethje, Pimblett and O'Malley after UFC 324
content: Justin Gaethje and Sean O'Malley picked up big wins on Saturday, but will the victories earn them a shot at undisputed glory?

title: Bangladesh raises concern over Hasina's address in India
content: the foreign ministry says it is "surprised" and "shocked" that she was allowed to speak at a public gathering . she has been living in india after she fled after the collapse of her government in august 2024 . the ministry also referred to pending requests for her extradition under the bilateral extradition agreement between the two countries .

title: Haveri DC receives Best District Election Officer award in Karnataka
content: Governor Thawar Chand Gehlot presented the award to Vijay Mahantesh Danammanavar during the National Voters‚Äô Day celebration held in Bengaluru on January 25

title: Pahalgam terror attack victim among 56 awarded by Jammu and Kashmir
content: The recipients come from various backgrounds and have been honoured for their significant contributions in different fields, as stated in an order issued by M. Raju, Commissioner Secretary of the General Administrative Department

title: ‚ÄòPeople ignore money, religion and caste while voting in Bigg Boss reality show, but highlight them in elections to assembly or Lok Sabha‚Äô
content: My vote, my right basic mantra of democracy, says judge during National Voters‚Äô Day celebration in Belagavi

title: Family, disciples of late folk dancer Vishwa Bandhu happy with his selection for Padma Shri
content: Bandhu is one of the three persons from Bihar whose names have been announced by the Central government for the Padma Awards

title: India to slash tariffs on cars to 40% in trade deal with EU, sources say
content: ‚ÄúPrime Minister Narendra Modi's Government has agreed to immediately reduce the tax on a limited number of cars from the 27-nation bloc with an import price of more than 15,000 euros [$17,739],‚Äù says sources

title: 9,550 kg of explosives seized in Rajasthan, man arrested; Central agencies likely to get involved
content: Besides ammonium nitrate, police also seized a large quantity of explosive accessories, including nine cartons of detonators, 12 cartons and 15 bundles of blue fuse wire, and 12 cartons and five bundles of red fuse wire, officials said

title: Telangana‚Äôs stunning rise and its unhinged growth
content: However, data on this achievement point to the need for policies to be formulated to spread the fruits of growth across the State

title: Noida techie death: The road that ended in a tragedy
content: On a dark fog-ridden January night in Greater Noida, a water-filled construction pit ‚Äî unmarked and unfenced ‚Äî became a fatal trap. Yuvraj Mehta, a 27-year-old techie, accidentally drove into it and died. The incident has become more than a personal tragedy, turning into an indictment of a city built ‚Äî and sold ‚Äî faster than ground realities can keep pace, finds Shrimansi Kaushik. Residents say neglect and institutional apathy have turned urban spaces into landscapes of loss

title: HYDRAA rescues nine workers stranded in Mir Alam lake
content: The team was conducting surveys for the construction of the ‚Çπ319.24 crore bridge connecting Shastripuram to Chintalmet in the southern part of Hyderabad

title: Jammu and Kashmir CM asks people to avoid non-essential travel for 3 days amid snowfall forecast
content: CM Abdullah said that Jammu and Kashmir had witnessed a severe drought after December, which has now been broken.

title: Fresh encounter breaks out between security forces, terrorists in Jammu and Kashmir‚Äôs Kishtwar
content: Security forces returned fire, and an intermittent exchange of gunfire was reported as the situation developed, officials said

title: Shibu Soren is and will forever remain 'Bharat Ratna': Jharkhand CM on Padma Bhushan to father
content: A statement from the Jharkhand Mukti Morcha said Shibu Soren should have been conferred with Bharat Ratna, and not Padma Bhushan, and said the demand for Bharat Ratna for him would continue to be raised

title: Colonel Sofiya Qureshi to be conferred with the Vishisht Sewa Medal
content: Some of the Ashok Chakra awardees are Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, Lieutenant General Dhiraj Seth and several others from the Army, Navy and Air Force

title: Action against BJP over PM flex boards ‚Äòroutine‚Äô, says Mayor
content: He said the measures were taken in accordance with strict directions issued by the Kerala High Court against the installation of illegal hoardings and flex boards in public places

title: Witnessing the Gaza tragedy: Dr. Santhosh Kumar‚Äôs lens captures the human cost of genocide
content: ‚ÄòThe Last Sky,‚Äô a photo exhibition that opened at the Fine Arts College Gallery, Palayam is open to public daily from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m. till January 31. Entry is free.

title: Deworming tablets to be distributed to more than one crore children on February 17
content: Children and adolescents aged between 1 and 19 will be provided ‚Äòalbendazole‚Äô tablets free of cost, says official

title: ‚ÄòWake-up call for America‚Äô: Obamas condemn killing of Alex Pretti
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. title: 77th Republic Day Parade Begins With Focus On 150 Years Of 'Vande Mataram': 10 Points
content: India displays its military and cultural strength at the 77th Republic Day Parade, presided over by President Droupadi Murmu, in Delhi's Kartavya Path.

title: Republic Day 2026 Live Updates: Republic Day Parade Begins On Kartavya Path, Top EU leaders Are Chief Guests
content: 77th Republic Day Celebration Live: India is celebrating its 77th Republic Day today, with President Droupadi Murmu presiding over the grand festivities at Kartavya Path, Delhi.¬†

title: Iran Tensions: IndiGo Halts Routes, Air India Alters Flight Paths
content: The cancellations come amid rising tensions between Iran and the United States, with apprehensions that the situation could escalate into a military conflict.

title: Opinion: Opinion | PM Modi Has A Shot At History-Making With EU's India Visit
content: At Davos, Ursula von der Leyen made India the centrepiece of her declaration of European independence. The president of the European Commission said that she was travelling to New Delhi to energise the relationship.

title: UAE Backs Out Of Pak Airport Deal After President's Surprise India Trip
content: United Arab Emirates (UAE) President Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan's surprise India trip seemed to have a ripple effect on South Asian geopolitical equations, bringing an indirect setback for Pakistan.

title: S-400 System, Used During Op Sindoor, To Make Debut At R-Day Parade
content: The S-400 had brought down five to six Pakistani fighter aircraft and one spy plane at a distance of over 300 km deep inside Pakistan during the four-day conflict in May last year.

title: Jewish Graves Desecrated In Barcelona Cemetery, Sparks Outrage
content: A spokesperson for Spain's Federation of Jewish Communities (FCJE) said that more than 20 graves had been desecrated.

title: Lucknow Trader's Legs Crushed With Thar SUV For 25 Minutes By Attackers
content: A businessman's legs were crushed under the wheels of a Thar SUV by a group of attackers in Lucknow.The victim was identified as Pawan Patel, a sand trader.

title: Meet Denmark PM Mette Frederiksen, Who Continues To Thwart Trump's Greenland Plans
content: As US President Donald Trump repeatedly revives his interest in acquiring Greenland, one leader has stood firmly in the way, Denmark's Prime Minister, Mette Frederiksen.

title: Private Jet With 8 Aboard Crashes During Takeoff At US Airport Amid Winter Storm
content: The Bombardier Challenger 600 crashed around 7:45 p.m., and there was no immediate word on the conditions of those aboard.

title: Gurugram Man Arrested For Kidnapping Woman, Attempting To Rape Her
content: A man was arrested for allegedly kidnapping a 23-year-old woman and attempting to rape her in the Leopard Trail area of the Aravalli region in Gurugram early Sunday morning, officials said.

title: Exclusive: Malaysian Fugitives Turn Violent In Mumbai After UK Deportation
content: The three most notorious fugitives from Malaysia -- the members of a criminal syndicate targeted in "Ops Jack Sparrow" -- engaged in a violent showdown with security forces at Mumbai airport after being deported from the UK.

title: Who Is Imaan Mazari, Pak Lawyer Jailed For "Anti-State" Social Media Posts
content: Imaan Mazari shot to prominence tackling some of the country's most sensitive topics while defending ethnic minorities, journalists facing defamation charges and clients branded blasphemers.

title: Drugs Worth Rs 55 Crore Seized From Mephedrone Factory In Maharashtra's Satara
content: The Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) has dismantled a mobile mephedrone manufacturing unit in Maharashtra's Satara district, seized drugs worth Rs 55 crore and arrested five persons, officials said.

title: "Felt Moral Obligation": Doctor Who Tried To Help US Man Shot By ICE Agents
content: The doctor - a pediatrician - whose identity has not been disclosed, recalled the horrific incident that he witnessed from his apartment.

title: India To Slash Tariffs On Cars To 40% In Trade Deal With EU: Report
content: India has agreed to immediately reduce the tax on a limited number of cars from the 27-nation bloc with an import price of more than 15,000 euros, two sources told Reuters.

title: On Camera, Guards Attacked At Hyderabad Complex. They Blame Blinkit Workers
content: A group of Blinkit delivery agents and their associates allegedly attacked security guards after a dispute over an unauthorised entry at a gated complex in Hyderabad on Saturday.

title: PM Modi Greets Nation On 77th Republic Day
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi extended greetings on the 77th Republic Day, urging citizens to renew their commitment to a 'Viksit Bharat'.

title: 'Vance, Navarro, Sometimes Trump Blocked India Trade Deal': US Senator
content: Cracks within the Donald Trump administration in the United States came under the spotlight when an audio recording of Senator Ted Cruz surfaced, where he openly criticised Vice President JD Vance and 'sometimes' even President Trump.

title: China's Top General Under Probe Over Nuclear Data Leak Claims To US: Report
content: China has placed one of its most powerful military leaders under investigation, triggering intense scrutiny inside and outside the country as allegations range from corruption to the leaking of sensitive nuclear weapons data to the United States.

title: Transfer rumors, news: PSG's goodwill gesture to Barcelona in Dro Fern√°ndez deal
content: a deal worth more than the release clause included in the midfielder's contract . the 18-year-old is on the verge of joining Paris Saint-Germain from Barcelona . it comes after there had been tense episodes between the clubs .

title: ‚ÄòAmaravati Bill‚Äô will be introduced in Budget session of Parliament, says Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: During the Telugu Desam Parliamentary Party meeting, he advises MPs to make efforts to mobilise additional funds from the Centre, desist from picking up conflicts with Telangana on irrigation projects, and refrain from acting in a way that dents alliance‚Äôs objectives

title: All eyes on Governor‚Äôs address
content: Speaking in Mysuru, Chief Minister Siddaramaiah said the Governor was free to make changes to the speech provided by the State government while delivering the Republic Day address

title: Democracy bulldozed, federalism attacked: Kharge
content: In a speech on the eve of Republic Day, Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge says federalism has become a casualty of the BJP‚Äôs ‚Äòdouble-engine‚Äô governance model, used to disadvantage Opposition-ruled States

title: AIADMK IT Wing calls TVK chief Vijay narcissistic
content: It launches a sharp attack on the actor-politician over his criticism of the AIADMK being a ‚Äúcorrupt party‚Äù and a slave to the Central government

title: ED files prosecution complaint against Winzo and its directors in Bengaluru
content: According to the ED, Winzo operated a real money gaming (RMG) platform offering over 100 games and claimed a user base of around 25 crore, largely from tier-3 and tier-4 cities

title: COAS General Upendra Dwivedi meets U.S. Army Secretary Daniel P. Driscoll in New Delhi
content: The discussions focused on deepening bilateral defence ties, expanding Army-to-Army cooperation, and reinforcing the shared commitment of both forces to global peace and security

title: Assembly election is a battle to defeat forces out to destroy Tamil culture, says CM Stalin
content: Only the¬†DMK¬†has the spine and courage to question the¬†BJP-led¬†government at the Centre that has betrayed the interests of Tamil Nadu, the DMK president says, speaking at an event organised to mark the Linguistic Martyrs‚Äô Memorial Day at¬†Kancheepuram

title: TMC, BJP supporters ‚Äòclash‚Äô near Kolkata; makeshift public meeting stage set afire
content: A makeshift stage, where former Tripura Chief Minister Biplab Deb addressed a public meeting in the afternoon, was allegedly set on fire during the clash

title: Government introducing modern Rover technology for mapping lands: Ponguleti
content: Licensed surveyors were being brought directly to the field-level to ensure accurate and transparent land measurements, marking a major shift in the land administration system, Minister said

title: Padma Bhushan conferred on actor Mammootty
content: He was about to receive his ninth State Award for his performance in ‚ÄòBramayugam‚Äô (2024), when the news arrived about him being selected for the Padma Bhushan

title: BJP sets up committee to draft manifesto for 2026 West Bengal Assembly polls
content: Union Home Minister leader Amit Shah and newly elected BJP president Nitin Nabin will visit the State in the next few days

title: Kalamandalam Vimala Menon honoured with Padma Shri
content: She has been honoured for her contributions in propagating as well as revitalising classical dances, especially Mohiniyattam.

title: Shubhanshu Shukla awarded Ashoka Chakra
content: Shubhanshu Shukla became the second Indian to go to space and the first one to set foot on the ISS as part of the Axiom-4 mission

title: India and EU are showing a fractured world another way to engage: EU chief Ursula von der Leyen
content: Ahead of the Republic Day parade, EU India Summit, EU Trade commissioner says FTA talks are nearing conclusion

title: Assam Opposition sniffs BJP plot to exclude voters from electoral roll
content: Six political parties wrote to the Chief Electoral Officer, alleging that a large number of fake objections were filed against voters without the knowledge of the listed objectors

title: Brinda Karat calls on women to drive away BJP-RSS, protect Constitution
content: At AIDWA meet, she calls for nationwide movement to restore MGNREGA, stressing its role in providing livelihood security to crores of rural poor, especially women

title: Elathur constituency in Kozhikode likely to witness a three-cornered battle
content: Despite the CPI(M)‚Äôs strong grassroots presence, the seat has been allotted to the NCP within the LDF since its inception in 2008. The Congress, encouraged by gains in local body polls, is keen to contest Elathur directly this time, while the BJP‚Äôs growing presence in select pockets adds another layer of complexity

title: RTC Employees Union seeks action amid surge in attacks on on-duty drivers, conductors
content: Citing repeated assaults since the launch of the Stree Shakti scheme, union leaders demand non-bailable FIRs and warning boards to protect RTC staff

title: Anantapur‚Äôs water conservation efforts earn Prime Minister‚Äôs praise
content: He highlights how community participation and local initiative can revive even the most water-stressed regions; it reinforces the State‚Äôs commitment to water security, one of the 10 core principles under the Swarna Andhra Vision, says Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu

title: Aajeevika Mission has become a ‚Äòmovement‚Äô, says Chouhan
content: Union Rural Development Minister lauds the work of SHG members, says the women have demonstrated remarkable strength and resilience

title: Chittoor bags award for excellence in electoral management
content: It is in appreciation of the district‚Äôs effective electoral mapping and efficient execution of the SIR process

title: India a messenger of peace in a conflict-ridden world, says President Murmu in Republic Day address
content: President Murmu spoke about various issues including Operation Sindoor and women empowerment, and also touched upon the topics of Vande Mataram and growing economy of the country

title: Padma Shri for Devaki Amma
content: Devaki Amma has been recognised in the Unsung Heroes category for her efforts to reforest Alappuzha, protecting around 3,000 rare plants

title: Curtain rises on the 16th International Theatre Festival of Kerala
content: ITFoK opens in Thrissur with global voices, renewed stages, and powerful stories from across continents

title: Vijay Amritraj, five others named Padma award winners in Foreigner, NRI and OCI categories

title: Goddess Padmavati rides celestial carriers on Ratha Saptami at Tiruchanur

title: Why feds call former Olympic snowboarder a 'modern-day Pablo Escobar'
content: Ryan Wedding, 44, and his associates allegedly trafficked more than $1 billion in cocaine across the u.s. and Canada . prosecutors laid out how wedding allegedly orchestrated multiple killings, including the assassination of a key government witness . wedding was born into a snow sports family .

title: The Patriots just showed us what it means to hire the right coach
content: the new England Patriots take over late in the AFC Championship game . they beat the texans 10-7 to advance to the super bowl . it's not supposed to happen this fast! teams aren't supposed to miss the playoffs three seasons in a row .
